description.lang: Homey gets technology out of the way, so when youre at home you can focus on the things that matter most to you.Switches and remotes arent always the best way to control the things around you, so Homey simply listens to your voice.No more pushing buttons or searching through apps. Just say what you want, sit back and let Homey do the work for you.Stay in control and automate everything athome by creating scenarios that join your favorite devices and services together.Homey isnt just futuristic, but also future proof. Like asmartphone, apps can be downloaded to extend Homeys functionality to always keep up with new devices and functionalities.Visit www.talkswithhomey.com for an up-to-date overview of supported devices.Monitor and control your home on the go with the Homey app for your smartphone. Know what is going on and keep control ofyour home, anywhere in the world.All outside connections to Homey are encrypted and secured, and only you decide who has access. Your data is only for you to see because, well, its your data.
